creditline: Gift of Harvey Wicks Brockley and Phillis B. Brockley
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: straight piece of wood, slightly wider at center, with notch on each end and protruding plug at one end with felt and bowstring fragments; carved on one side with 4 arrows on each end, pointing toward center and geometric patterns; buffalo in black pigment near center between arrows
title: Bow
